title: Easily 3 Star the 9th Clashiversary Challenge (Clash of Clans)
author: Judo Sloth Gaming
description:
How to Complete the 9th Clashiversary Challenge in Clash of Clans. Judo Sloth Gaming provides a Tutorial Guide on How to Best 3 Star the Clash of Clans Anniversary Challenge. This method is easy to replicate and will help explain exactly how to get the 3 stars in this new CoC challenge. Be sure to share your 3 Star Success in the comments and let me know what you think of the New Obstacle, Skins and Scenery. Clash On!

localize.description:
如何完成《部落冲突》中的第9个Clashiversary挑战。Judo Sloth Gaming提供了一份关于如何在《部落冲突》周年挑战中获得最佳3星的教程指南。这个方法很容易复制，将有助于准确解释如何在这个新的CoC挑战中获得3星。请务必在评论中分享你的3星成功经验，并让我知道你对新障碍物、皮肤和场景的看法。碰撞吧!
